question:
The Polavaram project has raised concerns into the people of which of the following states as some areas of these states come under the proposed dam? 
  1. Andhra Pradesh 
  2. Odisha 
  3. Chhattisgarh 
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The Supreme Court has ordered the Centre to hold a public hearing in the Polavaram multi-purpose project affected area in Odisha and Chhattisgarh. About the project
  • Polavaram Project is a multi-purpose irrigation project.
  • Its official name is Indira Sagar Multipurpose project.
  • It is a project over the Godavari River located in West Godavari District and East Godavari District in Andhra Pradesh state and its reservoir spreads in parts of Chhattisgarh and Orissa States also.
  • The project is slated to be complete by 2019.
Objectives of the Dam: The main aim is to interlink Godavari (Polavaram) & Krishna (Vijaywada) just before they merge into sea ,to Store water at Polavaram dam in West Godavari district.to generate 950+ MW hydro-electricity and to Supply Water to Visakhapatanam & Vizag steel plant.
